forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers by the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
